meta.name: description
meta.content: Our Mission is to EDUCATE, nurture and develop ALL LEARNERS to be self-directed and to strive for EXCELLENCE with CONFIDENCE and INTEGRITY by working cooperatively with students, parents and community.

div.span: Our Mission is to educate, nurture, and develop all learners to be self-directed and to strive for excellence with confidence and integrity by working cooperatively with students, staff, parents, and community. Please stay home & stay safe during these unprecedented times.

div.p: Please review Linden's Continuity of Learning Plan for students. Working together to continue to educate our students for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year!

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1350px; height: 380px;

article.div: Please review Linden's Continuity of Learning Plan for students. Working together to continue to educate our students for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year!

h1.a: LCS COVID-19 Update from the Superintendent-Schools Closed for the remainder of 2019-20 School Year

article.div: An email to parents, will be sent out on 4/13 to request a chromebook. The form will close on 4/17. Pickup will be the week of 4/20.
March 30-April 3 Photo Party! This week’s photo party theme is Outdoor Fun! Share pictures of the kids having fun outdoors to dwesterv@lindenschools.org. Happy Spring!
